issue.title: [bug]
issue.body:
Good morning, 
we encountered the following problem: 

when a message containing more than one image in the html text is captured by the mailscanner, the message is imported but only the first image is visible in the text. 
Unfortunately it is not possible to replicate the problem on gistable and gitdeveloper because the mail module is not working.

This is the version we are using: YetiForce CRM 6.4 Service Pack v6

To reproduce the problem:
1) send a message to a mailbox configured on the mailscanner that contains more than one image within the text.

![image](https://github.com/YetiForceCompany/YetiForceCRM/assets/112963243/664724a7-be2c-4e37-96c9-43b0241e5c9f)

2) Wait for the mailscanner to capture the message and then open it from the related ticket or from the email history
![image](https://github.com/YetiForceCompany/YetiForceCRM/assets/112963243/95f4a89d-5d17-4a93-b3ee-25d3be99acc3)

in the text of the message I only see one of the three images.
The images are actually there but as attachments
![image](https://github.com/YetiForceCompany/YetiForceCRM/assets/112963243/26fb4d70-605a-4d75-90ee-c424e8f440f4)

if I go to the mail module (Roundcube) and open the message, I see all three images:

![image](https://github.com/YetiForceCompany/YetiForceCRM/assets/112963243/b06f7bbc-a3c4-42c4-8679-16fef5a9106d)







<!--🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅

issue.title: Issue in SMTP Configuration

labels.name: 🤷‍♂️ MoreInfoRequired
labels.description: We need more information in order to be able to investigate this issue.

issue.body:
<!--🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅

Oh hi there! 😄

To expedite issue processing please search open and closed issues before submitting a new one.
Existing issues often contain information about workarounds, resolution, or progress updates.

**I Searched on Open and Closed issued but not found any related document**

🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅-->

# 🐞 bug report

### ⁉️ **Add Record in SMTP Configuration Hangs up on Local Server for indefinite time**

<!-- Provide a more detailed introduction to the issue itself, and why you consider it to be a bug. -->
I have used same ID and Password via RoundCube and for MailScanner, it works. but while configuring SMTP Configuration after save button, web page hang up and finally need to close. SMTP Configuration is not Saved. No error thrown.

<!-- Descriptions can be provided in English or Polish (remember to add [PL] for Polish in the title). -->
This issue is related to GMAIL configuration only, when used other provider email id configuration saved properly.

<!-- ✍️-->

### 🔥 How to trigger the error

<!-- If possible, please make a video using [ScreenToGif] (https://screentogif.codeplex.com/) or any other program used for recording actions from your desktop. -->
![image](https://github.com/YetiForceCompany/YetiForceCRM/assets/12723595/04321841-caa5-45ab-b967-cc28ed34ef22)

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to 'System Settings'
2. Click on 'Mail Tools'
3. Scroll down to 'SMTP Configuration'
4. Add SMTP Record for GMAIL with app password (we are not using less secure app due to security reasons)
5. SMTP connection is to setup


### 👎 Actual Behavior
On Save web page hangs up on Local Server, no error is shown
On gitdeveloper.yetiforce.com below error is shown
SMTP ERROR: Failed to connect to server: Connection refused (111)

<!-- Describe the result -->

### 👍 Expected Behavior
SMTP Configuration should save

<!-- Describe what you would want the result to be -->

### 👷 Testing

<!-- ✔️ Test the error and tick the following options, it is required to perform tests on current versions before reporting the error. Please include a video to confirm you performed the tests. ✔️  -->

- [ Y] I confirm that I tested it at https://gitstable.yetiforce.com
- [ Y] I confirm that I tested it at https://gitdeveloper.yetiforce.com

### 📷 Screenshot of configuration

<!--  Before reporting an issue, check if your server has been properly configured.
Please include a screenshot of your configuration. Here is an example: https://public.yetiforce.com/gallery/#15336225417147/15336225686795 -->

### 📝 PHP/Apache/Nginx/Browser/CRM Logs

<!--  Please send a part of logs that describes the circumstances when the error occurred to the following email address: github@yetiforce.com. The subject of the email MUST include your issue number.
DO NOT paste the logs in the issues, as they might contain sensitive info, such as credentials.
The more info you provide, the quicker we will be able to solve your problem.
Description how to enable logs can be found here: https://yetiforce.com/en/knowledge-base/documentation/developer-documentation/item/debugging
Additionally, include a screenshot of your browser’s console (e.g. press F12 in Google Chrome).
ex.

* cache/logs/phpError.log
* cache/logs/system.log
* cache/logs/errors.log

-->

### 🌍 Your Environment

<!--Describe the environment -->
<!-- ✍️-->

| Environment                         | Version / Name |
| ----------------------------------- | -------------- |
| YetiForce                           | 6.4.0
| Web server (name and version)       |    apache 2.4.46            |
| PHP                                 |           7.4     |
| Browser (name and version)          |     chrome           |
| Operating System (name and version) |        linux        |
| Database (name and version)         |    mysql 8.0            |

### ❓ Additional context

Add any other context about the problem here.

<!-- Please check on your issue from time to time, in case we have questions or need some extra information. Issues that don't have enough info and can't be reproduced will be closed.--->

### ❗️ Inform the community if you solve the problem

<!-- If you solve the problem on your own, please inform the YetiForce community and explain what caused it and how you fixed it.--->

issue.title: Understanding Folder Structure and Flow
issue.body: I would like to understand the folder structure and flow of the codes. I didn't find any documentation on the same. Please suggest me more on this.

issue.title: I am getting security configuration issue
issue.body:
Detected errors in the configuration of parameters related to system security. There may be problems with the system, or the entered data may be damaged or deleted. More information can be found in the article [Web server requirements at yetiforce.com](https://yetiforce.com/en/knowledge-base/documentation/implementer-documentation/item/web-server-requirement). Adjust the following parameters:

Security:
  public_html = 'www: Off' (Recommended: 'On')
  session.use_strict_mode = 'www: On | cron: Off' (Recommended: 'On')
  disable_functions = 'www: pcntl_alarm,pcntl_fork,pcntl_waitpid,pcntl_wait,pcntl_wifexited,pcntl_wifstopped,pcntl_wifsignaled,pcntl_wifcontinued,pcntl_wexitstatus,pcntl_wtermsig,pcntl_wstopsig,pcntl_signal,pcntl_signal_get_handler,pcntl_signal_dispatch,pcntl_get_last_error,pcntl_strerror,pcntl_sigprocmask,pcntl_sigwaitinfo,pcntl_sigtimedwait,pcntl_exec,pcntl_getpriority,pcntl_setpriority,pcntl_async_signals,pcntl_unshare,' (Recommended: 'shell_exec, exec, system, passthru, popen')
  allow_url_include = 'www: On | cron: Off' (Recommended: 'Off')
  
No file write rights:
  app_data/cron.php
  
  How to resolve this issue? i have hosted this in my AWS EC2 linux

comment.body:
> Hi, I have the same Issue here.
> 
> Security: public_html = 'www: Off' (Recommended: 'On') session.use_strict_mode = 'www: On | cron: Off' (Recommended: 'On')
> 
> Not sure how to "Point your webserver to the public_html folder and read the following https://doc.yetiforce.com/introduction/requirements/"
> 
> I am using cpanel, any kind soul here can share more on how to? Thank You!

I am not sure about cpanel. I resolved this issue through my server configuration (Nginx), i point the root directory to public_html and for "session.use_strict_mode" i edited my php.ini file.

issue.title: I am getting security configuration issue
issue.body:
Detected errors in the configuration of parameters related to system security. There may be problems with the system, or the entered data may be damaged or deleted. More information can be found in the article [Web server requirements at yetiforce.com](https://yetiforce.com/en/knowledge-base/documentation/implementer-documentation/item/web-server-requirement). Adjust the following parameters:

Security:
  public_html = 'www: Off' (Recommended: 'On')
  session.use_strict_mode = 'www: On | cron: Off' (Recommended: 'On')
  disable_functions = 'www: pcntl_alarm,pcntl_fork,pcntl_waitpid,pcntl_wait,pcntl_wifexited,pcntl_wifstopped,pcntl_wifsignaled,pcntl_wifcontinued,pcntl_wexitstatus,pcntl_wtermsig,pcntl_wstopsig,pcntl_signal,pcntl_signal_get_handler,pcntl_signal_dispatch,pcntl_get_last_error,pcntl_strerror,pcntl_sigprocmask,pcntl_sigwaitinfo,pcntl_sigtimedwait,pcntl_exec,pcntl_getpriority,pcntl_setpriority,pcntl_async_signals,pcntl_unshare,' (Recommended: 'shell_exec, exec, system, passthru, popen')
  allow_url_include = 'www: On | cron: Off' (Recommended: 'Off')
  
No file write rights:
  app_data/cron.php
  
  How to resolve this issue? i have hosted this in my AWS EC2 linux

comment.body:
Hi, I have the same Issue here. 

Security:
public_html = 'www: Off' (Recommended: 'On')
session.use_strict_mode = 'www: On | cron: Off' (Recommended: 'On')

Not sure how to "Point your webserver to the public_html folder and read the following https://doc.yetiforce.com/introduction/requirements/" 

I am using cpanel, any kind soul here can share more on how to? Thank You!

issue.title: [bug] date and day does not match
issue.body:
<!--🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅

Oh hi there! 😄

To expedite issue processing please search open and closed issues before submitting a new one.
Existing issues often contain information about workarounds, resolution, or progress updates.

Before you create a new issue, please check out our [manual] (https://doc.yetiforce.com/developer-guides/github/how-to-report-bugs)

🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅🔅-->

# 🐞 bug report

### ⁉️ Describe the bug
Start date of meeting is a day after the the meeting ends date.

### 🔥 How to trigger the error

From the contact's calendar widget, I clicked on the + button to create a Meeting.  I set the date as Tuesday Oct 24 2023 10:00 am and ends on Oct 24, 11:30 am.

After I saved the event, the contact's calendar widget showed the meeting to start on Oct 25 2023 at 10:00 am and ends on oct 24 2023 11:30 am.  The start date is later then the end date!

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to 'Contact'
2. Click on ' + on the Calendar'
3. Set a meeting start date and end date
4. Click 'Save'
5. Go back to the same contact.
6. See error in the calendar widget.  The meeting date is one day later but the end date is correct.  But that also means the start date of a meeting is later than the end date!

Thank you.

issue.title: [bug] Create user
issue.body:
Hey !

# 🐞 bug report

### ⁉️ Describe the bug ###

Can't create new user

### 🔥 How to trigger the error

![Animation](https://github.com/YetiForceCompany/YetiForceCRM/assets/92441163/21094871-ad7a-42a4-b4af-2ca64b6c1aca)


Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to User acces
2. Click on User
3. Add an user 
4. Add * infos and validate

### 👎 Actual Behavior

Can't create new user on the CRM

### 👍 Expected Behavior

I need to create new user.

-->

| Service Pack version                |         v5       |

comment.body:
Are you typing in the text? 
I noticed sometimes if you copy and paste from another source, Yeti doesn't like it.

Also, have you tried adding a different user, with different credentials?

issue.title: [Issue] Import directory is not writable
issue.body:
I suddenly started getting error while importing CSV file. I checked Issues previously reported and found one such reporting which is very similar to my issue.

"Import directory is not writable"

![image](https://github.com/YetiForceCompany/YetiForceCRM/assets/12723595/2b019fa3-68e1-426e-b6a9-6949b23df839)


I check permission on directory and same is 755.

![image](https://github.com/YetiForceCompany/YetiForceCRM/assets/12723595/73075965-f6b9-462b-948a-3c771c3daa4a)


I tried to remove this directory and created new also but no luck.

please assist in the matter.

Jeevan Pendhari

comment.body:
I tried to understand directory and found that Yetiforce is not attempting cache/Import directory. Instead same is /tmp/YetiForceTemp82a1aec8/

This i checked and found permission is set with root and has 755 permission level

![image](https://github.com/YetiForceCompany/YetiForceCRM/assets/12723595/2cdcb81c-6a20-4ad4-b2c5-7af88fd17973)

Please assist.

Jeevan Pendhari

issue.title: Email not properly formatted when sent from automation workflow
issue.body:
Hi,
I've created a workflow to send an email to a particular email (taken from a custom module, email field). The email is sent, the content is also correct (with all parameters correctly processed).

Unfortunately the format is not working. I have tried to copy and paste the text from word (there is an option), I've tried to add directly the "source" and I get an error. (The same source works perfectly with email template).

As I need to send some informative emails, these need to be with a good look and feel, even with colours and on multiple lines.

To test:
create a worklow with manual trigger
open the custom module
trigger the workflow
Wait for the email (I currently have set up my personal email address for tests, so it doesn't even take the actual address from the module).
Look at the received email.

Unfortunately cannot test on gitstable as there are no smtp to send emails.

Kind regards,

issue.title: We need help migrating a data array from Tilde
issue.body:
Good afternoon 
We need help migrating a data array from Tilde 

We have a site written on tilde and we really want to integrate everything to you in crm. 

We have had experience in transferring this data to another crm via api. 

How can we do this with you 

We need to link Tilda and your crm.
